meaningMnemonic: When you can <kanji>look at</kanji> <kanji>far</kanji> things, but not near things, you have <vocabulary>farsightedness</vocabulary>, <vocabulary>longsightedness</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>hyperopia</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the readings you learned with the kanji, which you'd know if it wasn't for your farsightedness (go get some glasses so you can read our lessons!).
